questions.content: Do you feel your mood has been unusually high, happy, or cheerful?
Do you feel more self-confident or capable than usual — perhaps even superior to others?
Do you feel you need less sleep than usual, or that you can function well with very little or no sleep?
Do you find yourself talking more than usual, or feeling pressure to keep talking?
Do you feel more active, energetic, or restless — taking on more tasks or being unable to sit still?
